description: Nice creamy body with nut and honey sweetness. A very nice and mild cup.

If we hadn't told you this is a decaf you certainly wouldn't know it from the taste. With notes of chocolate, caramel, and bright fruit, this cup will not disappoint. Caffeine was extracted using the European Process, which is generally considered to result in the best decaffeinated cup. Whether you prefer decaf or are simply trying to cut down on your caffeine intake, you will enjoy this variety.

region: Mandheling (Fair Trade; Organic), Northern Aceh Region
description: If you're unfamiliar with Sumatran coffees they can surprise you. Adjectives like 'rustic' and 'earthy' are often used to describe Sumatran varieties, and flavors tend to register mostly at the back of the palate. Malty, a little sweet, and maybe even an herbal hint, this is a very nice variety.
